segments.text: Well , do you have any experience in guiding ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I only have few experiences . I guided a few groups of foreign tourists from America last winter vacation . I showed them around some places of interest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What places of interest did you show them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Too many . I will just give you one example , Huangguoshu Falls , the largest waler-fall in China .
segments.speaker: S2
